abstract: Citigroup is reportedly coming under pressure to bail out investors in one of its troubled hedge funds, in another embarrassment for a company already among the biggest losers from the credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is reportedly coming under pressure to bail out investors in one of its troubled hedge funds, in another embarrassment for a company already among the biggest losers from the credit crisis.

headline.main: Citi Said to Offer Compensation to Hedge Fund Investors
